sentences.sContent: The teacher told him to weigh this matter patiently.
sentences.sCn: 老师让他耐心考虑这事。

sentences.sContent: He reeled out his finshing line and waited patiently.
sentences.sCn: 他放出绕线轮上的钓丝，耐心地等待。

sentences.sContent: Whenever we have trouble with our studies, our teachers help us patiently.
sentences.sCn: 每逢我们在学习上遇到困难， 老师总是耐心辅导。
